scenario_1.base_prompt: A low-angle, shaky, handheld camera shot of a dark, smoke-filled, destroyed city street at dawn. Cinematic, high contrast, photo-realistic.
scenario_1.flee: The scene focuses on a {age}-year-old {gender} desperately running towards a crowded checkpoint. They carry a small backpack and look over their shoulder in panic. The shot should emphasize the chaos and urgency of evacuation. Show other civilians climbing into a military-style vehicle.
scenario_1.stay: The scene follows a determined {age}-year-old {gender} wearing a tactical vest. They are crouching behind rubble, aiming a rifle. The shot should focus on their intense concentration and the defensive posture, with dust and debris swirling around. A comrade waves them forward.
scenario_1.theme_context: The audio should feature distant thunderous explosions, followed by immediate silence. The clip must maintain a consistent camera shake to convey realism.
